notificationsList.notifications:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the notifications page
**UI Location**: Notifications page, main heading
**When Users See This**: When viewing their notifications list
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Notifications"
notificationsList.markAsRead:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to mark selected notifications as read
**UI Location**: Notifications page, action bar
**When Users See This**: When one or more notifications are selected and at least one is unread
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button label
**Current English**: "Mark as read"
notificationsList.markAsUnread:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to mark selected notifications as unread
**UI Location**: Notifications page, action bar
**When Users See This**: When one or more notifications are selected and at least one is read
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button label
**Current English**: "Mark as unread"
notificationsList.markAllAsRead:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to open a modal to mark all notifications as read
**UI Location**: Notifications page, action bar
**When Users See This**: When there are unread notifications present
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button label
**Current English**: "Mark all as read"
